rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area leading to the living spaces.
Contemporary open-plan living and dining space with abundant natural light. Integrated seating arrangement.
Open-plan kitchen designed for modern functionality and ease of movement. Incorporates energy-efficient appliances.
Spacious master bedroom with attached en-suite bathroom. Designed for privacy and relaxation.
Second bedroom providing ample space, with views towards the garden or courtyard.
Third bedroom designed for a guest or child, ensuring comfort and easy access.
Dedicated home office space designed with ergonomic features, sound insulation and natural lighting.
Central bathroom serving the main living areas. Modern fixtures ensure user comfort.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with Vastu principles ensuring auspicious entry.
Large windows in the living area and master bedroom to ensure adequate natural light, placed per Vastu recommendations.
Balcony attached to the master bedroom offering a private outdoor space, positioned on the North side in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
